format:
<template>
    <Teleport v-if="mounted" to="#app-bar-actions">
        <v-btn>My Action</v-btn>
    </Teleport>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                mounted: false
            }
        },
        mounted() {
            this.mounted = true
        }
    }
</script>

name: Format Request
Details
format:
<template>
  <v-row>

    <!-- Materials Column -->
    <v-col cols="9" sm="6">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>Materials</v-card-title>
        <v-divider :thickness="2"></v-divider>
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item v-for="material in recipe.materials" :key="material.id">
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ material.name }}</v-list-item-title>
              <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ material.quantity }} {{ material.uom }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>

    <!-- Parameters Column -->
    <v-col cols="9" sm="6">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>Parameters</v-card-title>
        <v-divider :thickness="2"></v-divider>
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item v-for="parameter in recipe.parameters" :key="parameter.id">
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ parameter.name }}</v-list-item-title>
              <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ parameter.value }} {{ parameter.uom }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>

  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    recipe() {
      return this.msg.payload || { materials: [], parameters: [] };
    }
  }
};
</script>

  <v-row>

    <!-- Materials Column -->
    <v-col cols="12">
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>Recipe</v-card-title>
        <v-divider :thickness="2"></v-divider>
      </v-card>
    </v-col>
    
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  computed: {
    recipe() {
      return this.msg.payload || {};
    }
  }
};
</script>
